docs.title: Oi, eu sou o Otávio
docs.text:
How to ask questions the smart way

Learn vim, for your own good

Some posts about tech, life, career and other geek stuff.

docs.title: Who am I
docs.text: I'm currently a Lead Software Engineer at a consultancy company called Plan A Technologies, and also a passioned software developer who's been attracted to complex things. Currently my journey goes through distributed systems, artificial intelligence and graph algorithms, golang and other geek stuffs.

docs.title: Programmers who I like to follow their work
docs.text:
1. Ken Thompson
  2. Dennis Ritchie
  3. Donald Knuth
  4. Roberta Arcoverde
  5. Guido Van Rossum
  6. Linus Torvalds

docs.title: Books I recommend for programmers
docs.text:
1. Algorithms - Theory and practice
  2. Distributed systems
  3. The Pragmatic programmer
  4. Software Engineering at Google
  5. C++: The Complete Reference

docs.title: How to reach me
docs.text: You can send an email to otaviolarrosa@outlook.com

docs.title: Hello World
docs.text:
# Hello World 👋

Este é meu primeiro post com **MkDocs + Material** no **GitHub Pages**.

- Escrito em Markdown
- Build automático (Actions)
- Deploy no branch `gh-pages`

Até o próximo! 🚀
